entities.name: fred
entities.description: Fred is described as one of the twins who have perfected a type of Skiving Snackbox. He is taking turns with his brother George to demonstrate it to a cheering crowd.

entities.name: george
entities.description: George is described as one of the twins who have perfected a type of Skiving Snackbox. He is taking turns with his brother Fred to demonstrate it to a cheering crowd.

entities.name: lee jordan
entities.description: Lee Jordan is described as assisting the demonstration of the Skiving Snackbox. He is lazily vanishing the vomit at regular intervals with a Vanishing Spell.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as trying to focus on the correct method for Strengthening Solutions, but it's difficult due to the noise and commotion in the room.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is described as not helping Harry focus on his work. She is also part of the crowd cheering for Fred and George's demonstration.

relationships.description: Fred and George are described as twins who have perfected a type of Skiving Snackbox together. They are taking turns to demonstrate it to the crowd.
Fred is assisted by Lee Jordan during his demonstration of the Skiving Snackbox. Lee Jordan is lazily vanishing the vomit at regular intervals with a Vanishing Spell.
George is also assisted by Lee Jordan during his demonstration of the Skiving Snackbox. Lee Jordan is lazily vanishing the vomit at regular intervals with a Vanishing Spell.
Harry and Hermione are described as being in the same class together. They are also both part of the crowd cheering for Fred and George's demonstration.
